DP_DIAG (STRUCT)
DP_DIAG (STRUCT)
Â¶
TYPE DP_DIAG : STRUCT
Data structure containing DP Slave diagnosis data (see:
RDIAG
).
(see IEC 61158-6)
InOut:
Name
Type
Comment
status1
IIoDrvProfibus.DP_StationStatus1
DP station status 1
status2
IIoDrvProfibus.DP_StationStatus2
DP station status 2
status3
IIoDrvProfibus.DP_StationStatus3
DP station status 3
Diag_Master_Add
USINT
address of the DP-master (Class 1) which has parameterised
this DP-slave (255 means invalid or no parameterisation).
Ident_Number
UINT
Ident Number of DP slave
ExtDiag
ARRAY [0..235] OF BYTE
Extended Diagnosis Data

rows.Comment:
address of the DP-master (Class 1) which has parameterised
